module.name: class_of_composition_of_activity
module.keywords: module, composition, whole-part, class, activity, process plant

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application to record classes of whole-part relationship between classes of activity.
The nature of a whole-part relationship between individual activities may be specified by indicating a class of composition of which it is a member.

ul.li: the class of activity 'Much Binding B two shift operation'; and
the class of activity 'Much Binding B daily start-up',

example.p: that indicates each two shift operation activity contains a daily start-up activity, is a class_of_composition_of_activity.
The cardinality for this relationship is follows:

ul.li: a two shift operation activity has one start-up activity;
a start-up activity is the start-up for zero or one two shift operation activities.

purpose.note: The cardinality for the relationship is within the scope of the Cardinality_of_relationship application module.

li.p: a mapping between one class of activity and another that indicates the nature of a whole-part relationship between two individual activities.

li.note: A whole-part relationship between individual activities is within the scope of the Composition_of_individual_activity application module.

li.p: membership of a class of composition of activity.
li.note: Membership of a class of composition of activity is within the scope of the Activity_structure_and_classification application module.

uof.name: Class_of_composition_of_activity
uof.description: The Class_of_composition_of_activity UoF identifies a class of composition of activity and defines the classes of activity for the whole and part.
